description:
Eiger, Matterhorn, Grand Jorasses – peaks practically synonymous with the supreme discipline of mountaineering: north-facing ascents. Their Nordwand Pro jacket is designed specifically for that. Hardshell pants for extreme alpine expeditions.

It took years of fine-tuning and countless design iterations to achieve the superior fit and features of these hardshell pants. And it shows – down to the last detail.

The Mammut Pro Team athletes and the mountain guides from the Mammut Alpine School provided some of the best ideas. They’re also closely involved in the further development of the pants. The latest edition of the Nordwand Pro has been improved to offer some impressive advantages.

Certain parts are made with new Gore-Tex Pro Stretch technology. Combined with the innovative cut, this greatly improves your level of comfort and ability to move while climbing.

All other sections are made with new Gore-Tex Pro Most Rugged technology to offer the ideal combination of weather protection and maximum durability. In the new edition, they reinforced the parts that get the most wear and the workmanship has been refined down to the last detail.

The backing material is dope-dyed to reduce resource consumption. That means they use less water during production.

Designed for extra durability on technical alpine expeditions, the Nordwand Pro is a premium, full-featured pair of technical hardshell pants that doesn’t leave anything out.
name: Mammut Nordwand Pro HS Pants, Short - Mens
